sentences.english: You can get them at most of the newspaper kiosks in the street.
sentences.chinese: 在大多數馬路上的書報亭裏都能買到。

sentences.english: We are the persons who only find bookstall but not clothes when we go to shopping!
sentences.chinese: 是去買衣服的時候，不看衣服，只找報亭的人。

sentences.english: Avoid food at newspaper kiosks and gas stations.
sentences.chinese: 避免在報亭和加油站購買食品。

sentences.english: Open a newspaper booth to place a smoke vendor's stand , devoted cost is far more than these.
sentences.chinese: 開個報亭擺個煙攤，投入的成本都遠遠不止這些。

sentences.english: the customer interface documents may be provided via a kiosk.
sentences.chinese: 用戶界面的文檔可能由書報亭提供。

sentences.english: It can be bought practically anywhere at kiosks and convenience stores.
sentences.chinese: 這種雨傘在每一個報亭或是便利商店都輕易可以買到。

sentences.english: There will be not any supermarkets or newsstands along the newly-built channels.
sentences.chinese: 新建的通道兩邊不再設置超市和書報亭。

sentences.english: Stay away from buying sandwiches, drinks and snacks from newspaper kiosks and gas stations.
sentences.chinese: 不要在報亭和加油站買三明治，飲料或小喫。
